snippet: Priceline, a travel company from an earlier Internet age, is buying Kayak, its younger rival, for $40 a share.
abstract: Priceline, a travel company from an earlier Internet age, is buying Kayak, its younger rival, for $40 a share.

headline.main: Priceline to Buy Kayak Software in $1.8 Billion Cash-Stock Deal
headline.print_headline: Priceline to Buy Kayak Software In $1.8 Billion Cash-Stock Deal
